channel.title: Hello, these are very basic problems that might have been solved before
channel.description:
Hello, today i am asking some of you out there to answer these very basic and simple questions:
1.Fixing the extra hair out of the player's helmet. 2.Fixing the jaw/chin of the player. 3.Fixing any weapon emotes that you have, just send me the code and location of where to store it. 4.Is it possibe to make an option where you can create and make your character how you want him to look? 5.Making the characters female/male.
I would truly appreciate it if someone could answer some, or even one, whatever helps. :)

item.title: Hello, these are very basic problems that might have been solved before

item.description:
@deshawn82 wrote:

if all your answers can be found by using the search button why still insist on being spoon feed

Read full topic

item.title: Hello, these are very basic problems that might have been solved before

item.description:
@The_Samster wrote:

Lol k thanks, i already know how to get in my client and stuff obviously,and i know the client is meant for the graphics but i dont know where in the client would you have to edit the pictures and stuff, like is where is the exact location to edit the pictures, if u know where in the client, could u tell me?

Read full topic

Client.
Client.
And client.
Yo dude,
Lemme teach you something today.

Server = Game
Client = Graphics.
Well learned.
You passed
100%
